name: Little Acorn Falls (Cozy Fall Jam 2022)
description:
Little Acorn Falls
Game for the Cozy Fall Jam 2022

Skydiving pine-cone-fairies just want a bit of thrill in their life. Avoid the threats, and keep them from messing with the good vibes.

Controls: Space bar, Arrow Keys

-Spacebar = sends you to the middle of the opposite side of the screen.
-Holding up or down while pressing space = sends you to the top or bottom of the opposite side of the screen respectively.

-Moving leaves a Doppelganger of yourself in the last position you were in.

-Watch Out, each bird has a particular taste.

Credits

Programmer/Producer - Raj Sri Shanker
(Socials: @RajSriShanker & rajsrishanker.com)

Game Designer/Artist - Joshua Liew
(Socials: @dualeez & https://joshualiew.wixsite.com/gamedesignportfolio)
